name: suctionPower_setValue
description: This function is used to change the suction intensity of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the suction intensity.

parameters.name: predefinedSuctionPowerMode
parameters.description: The predefined suction power mode to set on the device.
